headline.main: Paderewski Will Be Honored at Musicale In Mrs. Andrew Carnegie's Home Feb. 10

lead_paragraph: A private musicale, as a tribute to Ignace Jan Paderewski, will be given in the gallery of Mrs. Andrew Carnegie's residence at 2 East Ninetieth Street on the night of Feb. 10. The contributing artists for the occasion will be Artur Schnabel, pianist; Bronislaw Huberman, violinist, and Emanuel Feuermann, 'cellist, who will be heard in a program of trios by Schubert, Beethoven and Chopin.
abstract: Aid to Poland: Paderewski Polish Relief Fund to benefit by Paderewski natl testimonial wk fetes
